thought: To craft blue stained glass I need to first craft 8 glass blocks. Each glass block requires smelting either sand or red_sand, so I will start by smelting one red_sand block from slot 11 into slot 12.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 11 to slot 12 with quantity 1
